name: Sofitel Hamburg Alter Wall

reviews.text: Spacious modern room with great view. Reasonably priced and tasty food from room service. All facilities good except wireless internet, which was rather slow and kept disconnecting.
reviews.title: Title

reviews.text: Not the hotel's fault, but very noisy work started on nearby construction site at 7am
reviews.title: Excellent, modern and location in the heart of Hamburg

reviews.text: Stayed to nights from 22. to 24 september. Had a very good reception from the staff. The room was modern, clean and had a great bed.
reviews.title: Everything was perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is perfect. 3 min to Town Hall Market, and 5 min to shopping, either Jüngfernstieg area (more high-end shops) or Mönckebergstrasse (all other known brands). Starbuck right outside the hotel, and also a U-bahn (subway) station. Walking distanse also to HafenCity (Harbour City) and Speicherstadt (Warehouse City). Great city with lot of canals and very friendly people.
reviews.title: Poor Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay here. The style of the hotel is modern. Our room was clean and a fair size. In room safe. Free wi-fi. Strange window in bathroom that looks out into main room (and no way to have privacy). Large tub to relax in. The bed was comfortable and the linens were nice too. There were some really fun (and delicious) candies for us to enjoy in the room upon arrival as well as mineral water.
reviews.title: Modern hotel with decent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly staff upon check in. They were also able to make change for us when we needed it.
reviews.title: Modern style in the centre of Hamburg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very close to the train and there is a grocery store close by too.
reviews.title: Weekend Trip to Hamburg

reviews.text: A good receptionist can make all the difference; at our recent stay at the Sofitel in Hamburg, which we were visiting for the first time, it took much less than a minute for our reservation to be acknowledged and the completed paperwork for registration produced; what a contrast to some places.
reviews.title: Excellent service, great location

reviews.text: I have stayed here several times and i really enjoy this hotel The location is excellent with many attractions and restaurants within easy walking distance. The hotel is nicely furnished and spacious, and the staff is very professional. The rooms are large and modern. The beds are really comfortable. Make sure you don't miss the breakfast buffet which is outstanding.
reviews.title: outstanding hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the front desk staff to be very helpfull we asked for directions to various sightseeing attractions, They all spoke and understood english. The hop on and hop off bus stops at the front door. It was a nice touch to receive a email warning and notification that some roads around hotel would be closed for a major event, The rooms were ultra modern
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: The hotel is located next to the Jungfernstieg, in the middle of the centre. Great location! Very modern hotel, nice furniture in the lobby and the rooms. The rooms were pretty spacious, I didn't expect it. Nice bathroom, nice pool area. Breakfast was gorgeous! No need to have lunch afterwards! The staff was very nice and welcoming. I would defintely stay here again!
reviews.title: Great stay in Hamburg

reviews.text: Here you dont quite get jwhat you expect from a hotel of this price class.
reviews.title: Lovely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room we had was relatively spacious in itself but definitely over furnished - it was hard to move without falling over something. What we missed was an electric socket on both sides of the bed. I also don't know who the interior decorator was but there was a slightly blurred photo of 2 distinctly unphotogenic young men hanging over the bed that I wouldn't have hung on the wall even if I had been related to them.
reviews.title: Very nice rooms and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only had one night in Hamburg so having a hotel in a great location was essential. This hotel is perfect for exploring the city and the shops! All within walking distance. Shopping is ridiculous. Soooo many shops.
reviews.title: Great location. Small rooms. Good staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some really nice restaurants, cafes, bars right by hotel.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Room was on the small side. With luggage it was even smaller! Nice view of canal. Small balcony. Big bathroom. Bath and separate shower etc.
reviews.title: Fantastic First Stay in Hamburg

reviews.text: If you want English speaking TV channels there are LOADS!
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel

aka: Sofitel Hamburg Alter Wall Hotel Hamburg
description: The Sofitel Hamburg Alter Wall welcomes you in the heart of the Hanseatic city. Between the famous harbour and the town hall, only 1 km from the central railway station and 17 km from the airport, Hanseatic elegance meets French savoir vivre. Clear linesand light characterise our 241 rooms and 19 function rooms. Make the most of our exclusive spa area or enjoy refined Mediterranean cuisine in our modern restaurant with views over the Alster canal.
